summary.para: Flags used by the function to specify the Flip3D window policy.

remarks.para: To use a DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY value, set the dwAttribute parameter of the function to DWMWA_FLIP3D_POLICY. Set the pvAttribute parameter to the DWMFLIP3DWINDOWPOLICY value.

summary.para: Use the window's style and visibility settings to determine whether to hide or include the window in Flip3D rendering.
Exclude the window from Flip3D and display it below the Flip3D rendering.
Exclude the window from Flip3D and display it above the Flip3D rendering.
The maximum recognized value, used for validation purposes.
